x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement:
People experiencing emotional distress or psychological crises hesitate to reach out for help -Traditional support channels like email or static forms are not fast, engaging, or private enough -Requests often get delayed or misrouted, leaving individuals without timely support -People may not always know how to express what they’re going through or where to find the right resources
There’s a strong need for a confidential, accessible, and intelligent platform that connects individuals to the right support channels quickly with personalized guidance and empathy.

How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

  • Record Producer: Simple, user-friendly wellness request form
  • Flow Designer: Smart routing of requests to wellness, HR, or counseling teams
  • Notifications: Confidential alerts and updates to responders
  • App Engine Studio: Custom Wellness Request application
  • AI Search: Auto-suggest self-help content and relevant support resources
  • Generative AI: Provides empathetic conversation assistance, summarizes user input, and recommends next steps
  • Performance Analytics: Trend analysis and wellness program improvement insights

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

  • Record Producer: Simple, user-friendly wellness request form.
  • Flow Designer: Smart routing of requests to wellness, HR, or counseling teams.
  • Notifications: Confidential alerts and updates to responders.
  • App Engine Studio: Custom Wellness Request application.
  • AI Search: Auto-suggest self-help content and relevant support resources.
  • Generative AI: Provides empathetic conversation assistance, summarizes user input, and recommends next steps.
  • Performance Analytics: Trend analysis and wellness program improvement insights.

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

Protecting sensitive and confidential user data with strict access controls

Ensuring AI responses remain empathetic, safe, and accurate

Balancing automation with human intervention for critical cases

Encouraging user trust and adoption of an AI-assisted mental health platform

Managing compliance with data privacy regulations and organizational policies
